title: Nexus Blitz Mode Question on the name of the reward after an event..
body:
In one of the events, the reward was Zileans Ultimate, but it gave us the ability to work exactly like a Guardian Angel {{item:3026}}, which is similar but shouldn't the reward just be simply called Guardian Angel then?

I'm making a poll on what I think it should be, you decide.

replies.body: I'd agree. If the effect is taken directly from Guardian Angel (which it seems to be based on some quick research) then why not just call it "Guardian Angel"?

My guess is cause the theme they're going with is champion blessings. Soraka's is healing (and more ocean drake than Soraka effect wise), Janna's is a shield, Blitz's is his hook and so on. I mean Zilean's ultimate is basically a scaling GA, so I have no real issue whichever name they choose personally.

Honestly, I wouldn't mind so much if the effect weren't just taken directly from GA. Like, maybe change is a bit so that it's more resemblant of Zilean's ult (like some minor "max/current health" and/or "AD/AP adaptive" scaling or something), make it it's own "unique" version of the effect, and not just an item effect named around a champion ability.
